text: Vy znaydete inshi kotri bazhayete ukladaty myr z vamy, ta takozh z yikhnimy lyudʹmy. Ale, yak tilʹky viyna erupts, vony boryutʹsya proty vas. Yakshcho ne tsi lyudy lyshayutʹ vas vyklyuchno, proponuyete vam myr, ta perestanete bytysya vy, vy mozhete borotysʹ yim koly vy zustrichayete yikh. Proty tsykh, my dayemo vam yasne upovnovazhennya
